text:
Company : FUJIAN VOCATIONAL COLLEGE OF SHIPBUILDING AND TRANSPORTATION

Address : Fujian Vocational College of Shipbuilding and Transportation
Address: No. 112 Shoushan Road, Cangshan District, Fuzhou Contact Name: Lin
Zhenfeng Tel: 83511211 Purchasing Agency: Fuzhou Construction Engineering
Management Co., Ltd. Address: Jinan District, Fuzhou Fuxin Middle Road 126
Project Contact Person: Chen Dandan Tel: 28062808

Country : China

Location : China

Tender_No : [3500]FZCM[GK]2020001

Dead line : 2020-06-24

Local International : Local

Funding Agency : No

Description : Tenders are invited for Announcement of the Tender for the
Service Procurement Project of the Fujian Shipbuilding and Transportation
Vocational College Purchase project needs to be implemented The government
procurement policy: Imported products, applicable (none). Energy-saving
products, suitable for (none). Environmental label products, applicable
(none). Information security products, applicable (none). Small and micro
enterprises, suitable for (none). Prison enterprise, applicable (none).
Promoting the employment of persons with disabilities, applicable (Contract
Package 1). The credit record, applicable to (Contract Package 1), is
implemented in accordance with the following provisions: (1) The bidder shall
pass the "Credit China" website
([www.creditchina.gov.cn](http://www.creditchina.gov.cn)) and the Chinese
government procurement before the deadline for bidding for this project The
website ([www.ccgp.gov.cn](http://www.ccgp.gov.cn)) inquires and prints the
corresponding credit records (hereinafter referred to as: "inquiry results
provided by bidders"). The inquiry results provided by bidders shall be the
original credit information inquiry results obtained through the above website
Printed copies (or screenshots) of the page. (2) Examination of the query
results: ①The qualification review team queries and prints the bidder's credit
record through the above website (hereinafter referred to as: "qualification
review team's query results"). ② If the query results provided by the bidder
are inconsistent with those of the qualification review team, the query
results of the qualification review team shall prevail. ③ If the qualification
review team cannot query the bidder's credit record due to the above website
(the qualification review team should print the original page when querying
the bidder's credit record through the above website and then file it with the
procurement document), based on the inquiry provided by the bidder The result
shall prevail. ④ If there are relevant information about the bidders who
should be refused to participate in government procurement activities in the
inquiry result, their qualification review fails. 5. Qualification
requirements of suppliers: (1) Comply with the conditions stipulated in
Article 22 of the "Government Procurement Law of the People's Republic of
China". Package: 1 none 6. Time, place, method or matter of purchasing bidding
documents: The bidding documents will be released together with the bidding
announcement of this project; bidders should first register on the Fujian
Provincial Government Procurement Network
([zfcg.czt.fujian.gov](http://zfcg.czt.fujian.gov).cn) Members, and then
register and download bidding documents by project on the public information
system of the Fujian Provincial Government Procurement Online through the
member account (please log in the corresponding (provincial level/city
level/district) according to the location of the project) Fujian Provincial
Government Procurement Online Open Information system registration ),
otherwise the bid will be rejected. 7. Price of bidding documents: 0 yuan 8\.
Supplier registration start time: 2020 -06-03 18:35 Registration deadline:
2020 -06-18 18:35 9. Bid deadline: 2020 -06-24 09: 00 (Beijing time), the
supplier shall deliver the sealed bid documents (the place of bid opening)
before this date, and bid documents that are overdue or do not meet the
requirements will be rejected. 10. Bid opening time and place: 2020 -06-24
09:00, Bid opening room on the 6th floor of Yuefeng Industry and Trade Office
Building, No. 126 Fuxin Middle Road, Jin'an District, Fuzhou City .
Announcement period: 5 working days. [Disclaimer: The above text is machine
translated. For accurate information kindly refer the original document.]

Document : [
http://www.bidsinfo.com/adminexe/documents/-CN4~20200604-20725404.html](http://www.bidsinfo.com/adminexe/documents/-CN4~20200604-20725404.html)

Description : Tenders are invited for Announcement of the Tender for the Service Procurement Project of the Fujian Shipbuilding and Transportation Vocational College Purchase project needs to be implemented The government procurement policy: Imported products, applicable (none). Energy-saving products, suitable for (none). Environmental label products, applicable (none). Information security products, applicable (none). Small and micro enterprises, suitable for (none). Prison enterprise, applicable (none). Promoting the employment of persons with disabilities, applicable (Contract Package 1). The credit record, applicable to (Contract Package 1), is implemented in accordance with the following provisions: (1) The bidder shall pass the “Credit China” website (www.creditchina.gov.cn) and the Chinese government procurement before the deadline for bidding for this project The website (www.ccgp.gov.cn) inquires and prints the corresponding credit records (hereinafter referred to as: "inquiry results provided by bidders"). The inquiry results provided by bidders shall be the original credit information inquiry results obtained through the above website Printed copies (or screenshots) of the page. (2) Examination of the query results: ①The qualification review team queries and prints the bidder’s credit record through the above website (hereinafter referred to as: “qualification review team’s query results”). ② If the query results provided by the bidder are inconsistent with those of the qualification review team, the query results of the qualification review team shall prevail. ③ If the qualification review team cannot query the bidder’s credit record due to the above website (the qualification review team should print the original page when querying the bidder’s credit record through the above website and then file it with the procurement document), based on the inquiry provided by the bidder The result shall prevail. ④ If there are relevant information about the bidders who should be refused to participate in government procurement activities in the inquiry result, their qualification review fails. 5. Qualification requirements of suppliers: (1) Comply with the conditions stipulated in Article 22 of the "Government Procurement Law of the People's Republic of China". Package: 1 none 6. Time, place, method or matter of purchasing bidding documents: The bidding documents will be released together with the bidding announcement of this project; bidders should first register on the Fujian Provincial Government Procurement Network (zfcg.czt.fujian.gov.cn) Members, and then register and download bidding documents by project on the public information system of the Fujian Provincial Government Procurement Online through the member account (please log in the corresponding (provincial level/city level/district) according to the location of the project) Fujian Provincial Government Procurement Online Open Information system registration ), otherwise the bid will be rejected. 7. Price of bidding documents: 0 yuan 8. Supplier registration start time: 2020 -06-03 18:35 Registration deadline: 2020 -06-18 18:35 9. Bid deadline: 2020 -06-24 09: 00 (Beijing time), the supplier shall deliver the sealed bid documents (the place of bid opening) before this date, and bid documents that are overdue or do not meet the requirements will be rejected. 10. Bid opening time and place: 2020 -06-24 09:00, Bid opening room on the 6th floor of Yuefeng Industry and Trade Office Building, No. 126 Fuxin Middle Road, Jin'an District, Fuzhou City . Announcement period: 5 working days. [Disclaimer: The above text is machine translated. For accurate information kindly refer the original document.]
